Author: Ehno
Name: Moonshadow's Tarot Reader
Punchline: FFXIV-themed tarot readings with AI-generated interpretations
Description: A mystical tarot card reader for FFXIV roleplay. Draw single cards or three-card spreads with AI-powered interpretations in Eorzean, Chaos, or Maternal modes. Uses Ollama for local LLM generation. Use /tarot to open.
